titleStmt.title: Die Martis. 23 May 1648. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. For setling of the militia of the county of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
